mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_item (`count`, order_id, product_id, sub_integral, sub_total) values (#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update order_item set `count` = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_integral = #{subIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_total = #{subTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `count`, order_id, product_id, sub_integral, sub_total from order_item
